creator: vdaburon@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 33583
Choose text view but still xml view

Hi,
View Results Tree when you select 1 time the XML view you can't show other view.

You could select other view like Text but the result in Reponse Data still in XML tree view until you restart your JMeter.

Regards.
Vincent D.

Works fine for me.

I notice that you are using a 3rd party add-on; that may be causing the issue.
Check the jmeter.log file.
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
Hi,
you are right.
I have no exception with JMeter 2.13 alone.

I have an exception with JMeter 2.13 + JMeter plugins 1.3.1.
You can close this issue, i will contact JMeter Plugins team for this trouble.
